attributes.action: To impeach the Prime minister for crimes against this country.
attributes.background: The Prime minister has continued to be delusional with dealings to the country. Has had many attempts to get her deal across. Yet everyone else isn't allowed. Denies the effect of universal credit on people. Despite repeated warnings. Clearly not fit to be in office.

rejection.details:
We can't accept a petition calling for impeachment because this procedure is now considered obsolete.  It's therefore not clear what action could be taken on this petition. 
  
You can find out more here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-7612
